titles.title: To require that excess funds provided for official allowances of Members of the House of Representatives be dedicated to deficit reduction.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Oversight.

bill.summary: 01/04/1995--Introduced. Requires funds made available in any appropriation Act for FY 1995 or any succeeding fiscal year for the official expenses allowance, the clerk hire allowance, or the official mail allowance of a Member of the House of Representatives that remain unobligated at the end of such fiscal year to be transferred to the Deficit Reduction Fund established by Executive Order 12858. Provides that such funds shall be in addition to the amounts specified in such order and shall be subject to its requirements and limitations.
